education.school: Savitribai Pule Pune University @ SKNSITS LONAVALA
education.description: I Entered college August 2019 and though I expect a change or transition from high school life to college, I didn't experience any difficulty adjusting. I chose Computer Engineering as my course because I was greatly interested in computers. I liked the course that I took, since I learned a lot of technical things, especially in programming. It is a difficult course, lots of math and logical thinking involved, but it is a course for a serious and studious individuals
